headline: Assessing Blackstone (BX) Valuation After Earnings Beat And Growing Fee And AI Infrastructure Tailwinds
summary: Blackstone (BX) is back in focus after reporting full year 2025 results, with revenue of US$14,450.27 million and net income of US$3,019.21 million, alongside commentary on fee growth drivers. See our latest analysis for Blackstone. The recent sell off around regulatory headlines and expense concerns has left Blackstone with a 30 day share price return of a 15.56% decline and a year to date share price return of an 18.33% decline, even though the 5 year total shareholder return of 116.56%...
